column3: Faculty of Management, Economics and Social Sciences
column5: Thank you for your interest in the master programmes offered by the WiSo Faculty.This page tells you everything you need to know about the master programme in Economic Education â€“ from a brief overview of the programme structure to the requirements for admission and the selection procedure.Please note: this programme provides education for teaching profession in vocational colleges in Germany. Therefore most of the courses in this programme are in German language.Essentially, there are two branches of study in the Master of Education programme:
